about_the_game:
Play with a variety of fun cartoon characters in a racing event for the Grand Prize of all Cartoon Land.

Run, jump, avoid traps and use items as you race to the finish!

🐇Choose from a zany collection of characters🐇


● Miss Bunni - A fun-loving bunny
● Avril - A skater girl, who loves to skateboard
● Sir Rocky - A knightly squirrel who will defend his title
● Aapo - A Mayan warrior who wants to win the race to buy more food
● Skelly - The ruler of Cartoon Land
● Plus many more!

💣Wacky Weapons!💣


● Banana Peel - Make your enemies slip on this! hehe!
● Fireball - Show 'em whos boss with this fiery weapon
● Bouncy Boots - Lets you jump super high
● Shield - Protects you from damage
● Magic Hand - Bend space and time temporarily with this cosmic glove
● Plus many more zany weapons to choose from!

Other Games from Angel Star Studios
detailed_description:
Wishlist Today!


About the Game

Play with a variety of fun cartoon characters in a racing event for the Grand Prize of all Cartoon Land.

Run, jump, avoid traps and use items as you race to the finish!

🐇Choose from a zany collection of characters🐇


● Miss Bunni - A fun-loving bunny

● Sir Rocky - A knightly squirrel who will defend his title

💣Wacky Weapons!💣


● Banana Peel - Make your enemies slip on this! hehe!

name: Wacky Cartoon Racers

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo and 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU / NVIDIA GeForce GTX750 or better
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
